Room.Name: North Oceancrest Hot Springs and Spa
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the luxurious North Oceancrest Hot Springs and Spa, relaxing in a large pool filled constantly with bubbling hot spring water.
Room.LongDescription: The North Oceancrest Hot Springs and Spa circulates in warm spring water from a natural source in the ground below the building into large pools where patrons can go to relax and recover. The natural mineral water comes from the mountains and is heated by a strange lava flow, located about two miles below the city.
